Sorry for the slow turn around time.  I'd love peek my nose in=
to the  
evolving spec.  You should publish it on a wiki like http://restpa=
tterns.wik.is

- Steve

l (http://book.restlet.org

so far because it was

j's email that led

concept application based on

hing close to being used
